summary: The implementation successfully adds 30 new certification images to the CertificationsGallery component as requested. All required images are referenced in the component code with appropriate alt text descriptions matching the certificate types specified in the BuildRequest. However, the diff does not provide evidence that the actual image files have been placed in the frontend/public/assets/ directory, making REQ-18 unverifiable from the available information.

missing_requirements.requirement: Configure the 30 newly uploaded certification image files as static assets in the frontend/public/assets/ directory
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files in frontend/public/assets/. While the component references all 30 images with correct paths, there is no evidence that the actual image files (IMG_4583-1.jpeg, IMG_4582.jpeg, etc.) have been placed in the assets directory. The diff summary shows 0 files added.
evidence: Diff summary shows: Added: 0, Modified: 3, Removed: 0
No files listed under ADDED FILES section
